oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 2 from oral history interview with Beverly Briley, 1980 April 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with former Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley, conducted on 3 April 1980 by Paul Clements as part of the Century III Nashville: Nashville Heritage Project. Briley, who was Mayor of Nashville from 1963 to 1975 and was the first mayor after the consolidation of the city and county government, discusses mass transit in Nashville. The complete interview, as well as a transcript, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980--Interviews
